Rotation.RotationNotes:
Tap Left Ctrl: Switches between AOE (Divine Storm) and Single Target (Crusader Strike).
Hold Left Shift: Will Pause rotation and stop auto-attack. Useful when raid leader calls out stop dps and you don't want to switch targets.
Press Left Alt: Will cast Hammer of Justice (Stun) on Mouse Over.
